import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { IBookmark } from '../../models/models' import { AppState } from '../../redux/app-state'; import './bookmarkCard.css'; export default function BookmarkCard(props: IBookmark) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return (
{props.name}

Category: {props.category}


<> Modal heading Woohoo, you're reading this text in a modal!
) } // export default bookmarkCard;
